name: Species: Cyclops
description: As you are a Cyclops, you have many traits which differ from a standard human. Firstly, you are larger, have more health and become more hungry quickly. Secondly, you are stronger and can channel your rage into physical form.

text.text: <You have 3 extra hearts and are 30% larger than a standard human>
<You deal 30% more damage and can perform the abilities SMASH! and Endurance
